title: Snowdom Mission Path Problem -serious-
body:
Sup,

on a new Account it gave me the 2 Paths after the first 2 AI Matches, but it is locked to the Naughty Path which really sucks. 

To do the 'Nice' Path we need to either: 
"Win 3 Legend of the Poro King games" (requires lv 10)
or
"Win 3 ARAM games" (requires lv 6)

So after the first 2 Matches the Account is lv 3 on the edge to lv 4, but unless i reach lv 6 within the next 2 Matches it's impossible to do the 'Nice' Path. 

can we get an urgend fix for that?

replies.body: I didn't realize about the level requirement, so that's definitely a nice find and good feedback to our devs!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after you reach level 6 so we can take a look at your case and find some options.  See you there!
Oh my!  I don't have visibility on EU support, and we can't really do much until you reach level 6 on the mentioned account.  At that point we could look into changing your path.
No thanks. I dont care enough about this Game, that i would bother with the Support.

That's quite an interesting perspective that I personally wouldn't have thought about. Unfortunately, that would require a change in the unlocking game mode system, or a change in the quests as they currently are, both of which I highly doubt will change for this special case. They have mentioned in the past that not all quests they release are intended to be able to be completed by every player, which could then be reapplied to special cases such as this as they arise. While losing isn't something that I or they would want to encourage you to do intentionally, you could try to recruit a group of players who are willing to help you with this. Even in a loss, you will gain experience, and the loss won't be counted in the quest.
